page.title: 04THE SCOUTS _ HATCH BEAUCHAMP
page.content: The Scouts meet on Tuesdays at the Huish Camp Site in Huish Woods, in the summer and at West Hatch Scout Hut, in the winter. Every year the Scouts have a major camping trip. In 1986, they are aiming to climb the three highest mountains in the British Isles: Snowdon, Ben Nevis and Scafell Pike. The Scouts are allowed to carry knives,the Cubs are not. The Scouts meet at 19.00 and dismissal is at 21.00. The full uniform is a green shirt and trousers,a belt and a beret. Usually during Scout meetings,we learn something useful,like how to skin and cook a rabbit or how to put up a tent. Later on we play a game like "Dicky Blow the Whisle" and then sometimes we learn something else.
